trans-unit.resname: J20·1 | Arena Rector | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arena Rector
trans-unit.target: Arena Rector

trans-unit.resname: J20·1 | Arena Rector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: J20·2 | Enlightened Tutor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Enlightened Tutor
trans-unit.target: Enlightened Tutor

trans-unit.resname: J20·2 | Enlightened Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

trans-unit.resname: J20·3 | Spellseeker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spellseeker
trans-unit.target: Spellseeker

trans-unit.resname: J20·3 | Spellseeker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.target: Demonic Tutor

trans-unit.resname: J20·5 | Infernal Tutor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Infernal Tutor
trans-unit.target: Infernal Tutor

trans-unit.resname: J20·5 | Infernal Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal a card from your hand. Search your library for a card with the same name as that card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Reveal a card from your hand. Search your library for a card with the same name as that card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: J20·5 | Infernal Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, instead search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, instead search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.source: Gamble
trans-unit.target: Gamble

trans-unit.resname: J20·6 | Gamble | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: J20·7 | Birthing Pod | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{G/P}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G/P}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.
